audioText: Tu devras terminer ce rapport avant vendredi si tu veux prendre tes vacances.
question: When must the person finish the report?
options: Before Friday if they want to take their vacation
After Friday when they return from vacation
Before Monday to meet the deadline
By the end of the month for the quarterly review
explanation: The sentence says 'Tu devras terminer ce rapport avant vendredi si tu veux prendre tes vacances' - You will have to finish this report before Friday if you want to take your vacation. 'Devras' is the 2nd person singular future tense of 'devoir' (must/have to).
